title: Birmingham (England)
name: HMV Institute
price: Tickets Â£6-25 (price varies with band fame)
content: Having recently undergone a huge and lengthy restoration, HMV Institute is the new name for the old Sancutary and Barfly venues in Digbeth. Focusing on Alternative, pop and urban music The Institute has 3 arenas hosting gigs from local and touring bands. The venue also hosts regular club nights.
